channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: In defense of Apple’s $230 iPhone sock
item.description: From the same label that made the iconic Steve Jobs mockneck, the iPhone Pocket could be the next Labubu... if you have the disposable income.

item.title: Stewart Rhodes Relaunched the Oath Keepers. Even Old Oath Keepers Don't Care
item.description: Militia leader Stewart Rhodes, who was convicted for his role in the January 6 attack, is asking potential new members and supporters to send money. Former allies are unconvinced.

item.title: Amazon retire 35 % à cet excellent moniteur Alienware incurvé QD-OLED (240 Hz, Dolby Vision, 0,03 ms) lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Voici un écran QD-OLED pensé pour celles et ceux qui veulent jouer comme si la réalité n’était qu’un mode graphique. Et pour le pré-Black Friday, le Dell AW3225QF fait un pas en avant coté tarif, il s'affiche à 725,98 euros au lieu de 1 119 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Apple halves commissions for mini app makers
item.description: Apple introduces a new program for app developers offering a reduced 15% commission on qualifying mini app transactions.

item.title: Rosetta Stone Is Basically Paying You to Learn 25 Languages for Life Thanks to an Early Black Friday Offer
item.description: You will have lifetime access to a variety of languages, from Persian to Hindi, German, Korean, and more.

item.title: Mozilla announces an AI ‘window’ for Firefox
item.description: Another day, another AI browser. This time, it’s Firefox, the self-described “independent browser” from Mozilla. Firefox says it is building an AI browsing feature called AI Window that includes an AI assistant and chatbot. The company calls it an opt-in “intelligent and user-controlled space” that is currently being built “in the open” with user input. […]...

item.title: Police take down three cybercrime operations in latest round of ‘whack-a-mole’
item.description: Authorities from nine countries took down three cybercrime operations, including the Rhadamantys infostealer, which allegedly had access to the crypto wallets of more than 100,000 victims.

item.title: I spent weeks testing the Hisense U65QF, and it has great picture quality for the price
item.description: The Hisense U65QF is a good-quality budget mini-LED TV that separates itself from the pack with its Fire TV smart TV platform and Alexa integration.

item.title: The Fire TV Stick 4K Max is back down to $35, its best price in a year
item.description: Amazon’s Black Friday officially starts on November 20th, but in reality, it’s already well underway. For the past week or so, we’ve been seeing the retailer drop a number of good Black Friday deals, and the latest Fire TV Stick 4K Max is one of the best. Right now, you can buy the streaming stick […]

item.title: Windows 11's new update fixes some weird bugs that might slow down your PC or eat your handheld's battery
item.description: November update fixes nasty Task Manager bug and a glitch that caused battery drain with handhelds in sleep mode.

item.title: World Labs is betting on ‘world generation’ as the next AI frontier
item.description: In recent years, we've seen generative AI move quickly through different eras: chatbots, image-generation, voice, video-generation, and more. But Dr. Fei-Fei Li, longtime AI pioneer and co-director of Stanford's Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence (HAI), is staking out what she thinks is the next frontier: spatial intelligence, a nascent field that she believes is the […]...

item.title: Tesla is recalling over 10,000 Powerwall 2 batteries due to burn risks
item.description: Tesla is expanding a Powerwall 2 battery recall that started in Australia last September to the US. A ”third-party battery cell defect” can cause units to “stop functioning normally, resulting in overheating, smoking and in some cases smoke or flame causing minor property damage.” The company has received 22 reports of overheating, six reports of […]...

item.title: Even Realities’ new smart glasses ditch cameras and speakers
item.description: The wearable technology company Even Realities has taken the wraps off its latest pair of “human-centric” smart glasses, which it claims are designed not to interfere with your everyday life. The G2 Display Smart Glasses come without outward-facing cameras and external speakers, a move Even Realities says “removes the anxiety of being recorded, overheard or […]...

item.title: Is the desktop PC on its deathbed? Dell’s cheapest laptop is just $300 for Black Friday - while its most affordable desktop is a mindblowing $500
item.description: The Dell 15 Laptop costs just $299 for Black Friday, while Dell's Slim Desktop is $500.

item.title: Forget Ring – these subscription-free doorbells are going cheap in Amazon's early Black Friday sale
item.description: See who's calling, talk to visitors, check packages, and watch video recordings all without any extra expenses.

item.title: Google Gemini Live gets its 'biggest update ever' with 5 new upgrades – here's how to try them
item.description: Gemini Live is now even more natural, conversational, and personalized to the current topic and tone.

item.title: La Chine veut brider les performances des voitures électriques avec cette astuce toute simple
item.description: Le ministère chinois de la Sécurité publique vient de dévoiler un projet de réglementation qui pourrait changer la donne sur le marché de la voiture électrique. Au programme : limitation des accélérations fulgurantes, renforcement de la sécurité des batteries et interdiction des portes électroniques sans système de secours mécanique.

item.title: These freemium VPNs are all on sale for Black Friday - here's why you should upgrade now
item.description: Free VPNs are handy in a pinch, but you get more features and fewer restrictions with a paid subscription.

item.title: Is Tesla about to finally surrender to Apple CarPlay?
item.description: Tesla, one of the original Apple CarPlay holdouts, may finally be close to actually adopting the immensely popular phone projection system for its cars, Bloomberg reports today. The company has started testing the capability internally, anonymous sources tell the publication, and could be close to releasing it publicly, perhaps in a few months — or […]...

item.title: The 10 companies that just launched from Betaworks latest startup camp
item.description: Early-stage venture fund Betaworks announced the latest 10 companies launching from its prestigious Camp program.

item.title: Tesla might finally bring CarPlay to its EVs
item.description: The addition of CarPlay would mark a significant change for Tesla, which has so far shunned phone mirroring in its vehicles.

item.title: Scammers trick over 500,000 victims with fake Google, Bing ads to steal personal info
item.description: "Payroll Pirates" have been spoofing payroll and HR platforms to scam people.

item.title: Restore fired FTC commissioner, consumer protection groups tell Supreme Court
item.description: The Consumer Federation of America, Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC), and other consumer advocacy and tech groups are speaking up in defense of former FTC Commissioner Rebecca Kelly Slaughter, who was fired without cause by the Trump administration in March. A total of 40 groups — which also include Demand Progress Information Center and UC Berkeley […]...

item.title: Two Key ‘Superman’ Locations Come Alive in BTS Images (Exclusive)
item.description: 'Superman: The Art and Making of the Film' is out next week—check out our exclusive look.

item.title: Satechi’s new puck sticks a bunch of extra ports to the back of your phone
item.description: Satechi has announced a new multiport hub that looks like a hockey puck and is designed to attach to smartphones and laptops using a ring of magnets, but it’s not a wireless charger. The OntheGo 7-in-1 Multiport Adapter features seven ports in total and connects to devices using a short integrated USB-C cable that wraps […]

item.title: Google’s NotebookLM will now do ‘deep research’
item.description: Google is pairing up two of its research products: NotebookLM and Gemini’s agentic AI tool Deep Research. On Thursday, the company announced that all users will have access to Deep Research in NotebookLM within a week. Google recently linked Deep Research to other Workspace products like Gmail and Drive, allowing Gemini to draw context from […]

item.title: Facebook Marketplace gets new collaborative and social features, Meta AI integrations
item.description: Meta is testing collaborative buying to let users invite a friend to join their chat with a seller.

item.title: Google’s NotebookLM adds ‘Deep Research’ tool, support for more file types
item.description: The service rolling out "Deep Research," a tool that will automate and simplify complex online research.

item.title: How to watch Ireland vs Portugal: Free streams, TV channels and preview for 2026 World Cup Qualifier
item.description: We'll show you all the ways to watch Ireland vs Portugal in Group F this Thursday from anywhere in the world, including free options with English commentary.

item.title: Elon Musk fait machine arrière : les Tesla bientôt compatibles avec Apple CarPlay ?
item.description: Tesla serait sur le point de réaliser une mise à jour majeure de ses voitures, pour permettre l'arrivée d'Apple CarPlay. Elon Musk aurait enfin retourné sa veste.

item.title: Boulanger dévoile une pluie de réductions pour le Pré-Black Friday : 23 deals à ne pas louper
item.description: Boulanger propose des offres de pré-Black Friday depuis fin octobre, avec des réductions allant jusqu’à 40 % sur un tas de produits Tech. Smartphones, TV, ordinateurs portables, produits audio... Tout y passe ! Voici celles qui méritent votre attention.

item.title: Guide : quels sont les meilleurs aspirateurs robots pas chers en 2025 ?
item.description: Un petit aspirateur robot vous ferait de l'œil, mais vous n'avez pas envie de dépenser des mille et des cents dans ce type d'appareil ? Bienvenue sur notre comparatif des meilleurs robots aspirateurs abordables à acheter.

item.title: This Engine Sucks Energy From Deep Space Without Leaving the Ground
item.description: This engine won't be fueling interstellar missions, but still finds an unexpected way to use deep space energy to generate power.

item.title: Netflix is bringing Red Dead Redemption to mobile
item.description: Another one of Rockstar’s greatest hits is coming Netflix. On December 4th you’ll be able to play Red Dead Redemption and it’s zombified standalone DLC Undead Nightmare for free as long as you have a Netflix subscription. The news broke when prolific video game news hound Wario64 found listings for the game on the iOS […]

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres !

item.title: Amazon ne fait pas l’impasse sur le pré-Black Friday : voici les 17 offres à saisir
item.description: Amazon propose déjà ses premières offres avant le Black Friday et n’hésite pas à casser les prix de nombreuses références Tech sur son site. Il y aura forcément de quoi vous faire plaisir, retrouvez les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: CarPlay pourrait finalement arriver dans les Tesla !
item.description: Allons bon, on pensait que ça n'arriverait jamais : Tesla développerait finalement le support de CarPlay dans ses véhicules !

item.title: CISA warns federal agencies to patch flawed Cisco firewalls amid ‘active exploitation’ across the US government
item.description: The federal cybersecurity agency said some government departments had been actively exploited after failing to properly patch their systems.

item.title: Focal Azurys : cet élégant casque Hi-Fi made in France réduit son prix de 200 € pour le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Un casque hi-fi fermé, fabriqué en France, qui mêle savoir-faire artisanal et transducteurs maison, c’est l’Azurys : une élégance signée Focal. Et pour ce pré-Black Friday, il se permet une coupe dans son tarif, passant de 549 euros à 349 euros sur Son-Vidéo.com.

item.title: TikTok launches its own version of Instagram’s broadcast channels
item.description: TikTok is rolling out “bulletin board,” a new one-to-many messaging feature that mirrors Instagram’s broadcast channels. The tool lets creators and brands share text, images, and videos directly with followers.

item.title: Firefighters received chemical burns at Elon Musk’s Boring Company construction site
item.description: The firefighters had to be treated at a hospital and received permanent scars, according to a report from Fortune. But the Boring Company was not fined after it met with state officials.

item.title: How to watch Cheltenham November Meeting 2025 for *FREE* — Watch Jonbon's return live on ITVX
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch all of this weekend's Cheltenham action beginning with the return of Jonbon live on ITVX from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Google takes on Pinterest with a dedicated ‘inspirational’ images tab in its mobile app
item.description: The company is adding an "Images" icon at the bottom of Google's Search app for iOS and Android devices that will display images personalized to the user's interests.

item.title: Tesla Powerwall 2 recall expands to US after reports of fires
item.description: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission has received 22 reports of overheating, smoking, or burning Tesla Powerwall 2 home batteries. The company will replace defective units.

item.title: Quel sera le prix de la Steam Machine ? Nos prédictions
item.description: Valve a dévoilé sa console de jeu de salon Steam Machine, mais n'a pas annoncé son prix de vente. Voici ce à quoi on peut s'attendre.

item.title: How to watch Armenia vs Hungary for *FREE* — Stream UEFA World Cup 2026 Qualifier
item.description: Here's our quick guide on how to watch Armenia vs Hungary for free with Dominik Szoboszlai looking to lead his team to a crucial three points.

item.title: Google’s SIMA 2 agent uses Gemini to reason and act in virtual worlds
item.description: “SIMA 2 is a more general agent. It can complete complex tasks in previously unseen environments. And it's a self-improving agent... which is a step toward more genera- purpose robots and AGI systems more generally.”

item.title: TCL just launched an unbelievably cheap gaming QLED TV, with 144Hz support, plus both Dolby Vision and HDR10+
item.description: TCL's new gaming QLED TV starts at just $599.

item.title: Le succès des vidéos rejouant l’Histoire grâce à l’IA
item.description: Des touristes observant la reine Marie-Antoinette avant son exécution, un soldat américain se filmant lors du Débarquement de 1944 en France : des vidéos de grands évènements historiques générées par intelligence artificielle (IA) remportent un franc succès sur les réseaux sociaux, alimentant les craintes d’une approche faussée de l’Histoire.

item.title: Google sues Chinese hacker group which allegedly stole $1 billion from a million victims
item.description: The Lighthouse Enterprise is a major phishing-as-a-service operation from China used to build thousands of fake sites.

item.title: Black Ops 7 launch live: release time, how to play early, and more ahead of next Call of Duty release
item.description: Our live coverage of the Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 launch as the game releases worldwide.

item.title: DJI Neo 2 vs DJI Neo: 5 big upgrades in DJI's latest selfie drone
item.description: What a difference a year makes in the world of drones

item.title: Disney Is Getting in on AI Slop
item.description: CEO Bob Iger says that Disney+ is working towards platforming AI-driven, user-made content.

item.title: LinkedIn adds AI-powered search to help users find people
item.description: LinkedIn's AI-powered people search is rolling out to premium users in the U.S.

item.title: LinkedIn’s new AI people search unlocks the power of its network
item.description: The world’s greatest business expertise still resides in the brains of individual humans. This feature is about making it easier to find them. Last June, LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky took on a second job. Microsoft, the social network for business professionals’ owner since 2016, expanded his responsibilities to include Microsoft 365—the suite still better known by its former name, Microsoft Office—and its Copilot AI assistant. The role charges him with making AI useful in a productivity context, a goal that’s still very much a work in progress.But Roslansky also remains in charge of LinkedIn, ...

item.title: How to watch Cameroon vs. DR Congo online for free
item.description: How to watch World Cup qualifiers for free. Live stream Cameroon vs. DR Congo in World Cup qualifiers for free.

item.title: Fini le fouillis, Google Messages muscle ses groupes avec cette nouvelle fonctionnalité
item.description: Les discussions de groupe sur Google Messages vont bientôt gagner en clarté : Google commence à tester la mention @ dans les conversations RCS. De quoi transformer un dialogue brouillon en espace où l’on peut enfin interpeller directement ses amis.

item.title: Black Friday PC portable : La sélection des 11 meilleures offres sur les laptops bureautiques et gaming d’Apple, MSI, Lenovo…
item.description: Laptop bureautique ou gaming ? Intel ou AMD ? Carte graphique puissante ou portabilité ? On a l'embarras du choix pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Les PC portables Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI sont proposées avec des grosses réductions.

item.title: Gambling online? Watch out for these risks, say public health experts
item.description: Gambling online is more accessible than ever. Online betting is more accessible than ever, with 14% of U.S. adults saying they bet on professional or college sports online either frequently or occasionally, according to a February poll by The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research. It’s also in the news, with a growing list of sports betting scandals making headlines.Public health advocates and personal finance advisers say it’s important to know the risks if you’re going to gamble online.“Gambling and ‘responsibly’ seem to be oxymoronic, because if you’re gambling it’s all ...

item.title: TikTok attaqué en France pour diffusions d’extraits de films et de séries non autorisées
item.description: Le réseau social préféré des Jeunes est attaqué par la SACD, l'organisme chargé de défendre les droits des auteurs d'œuvres (films, séries, dessins animés, spectacles ...) qui relèvent de son répertoire.

item.title: Should we really blame billionaires for our own financial struggles? In fact, more Americans say yes
item.description: People increasingly see extreme wealth as contributing to an unfair society, and that sentiment is especially high with Gen Z and millennials. Americans have long ogled the rich, but the country’s widening wealth gap—and the billionaires fueling it—have been facing growing scrutiny.

item.title: Ce robot tondeuse premium de chez Dreame est presque à moitié prix lors du pré-Black-Friday (-44 %)
item.description: Grâce à une navigation laser, une appli bien pensée et une intelligence embarquée qui s’améliore avec le temps, le Dreame A1 Pro taille votre jardin comme un pro… pendant que vous faites autre chose. Pour le pré-Black Friday sur Amazon, on le trouve à 899 euros au lieu de 1 599 euros.
